welcome_message_body: Welcome to Saltillo! Get ready to experience the charming blend of colonial architecture, vibrant culture, and delicious cuisine that this city is known for. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Saltillo has to offer.

restaurants.name: Chick And Cow
restaurants.description: Chick And Cow is a fried chicken joint located in Saltillo.

restaurants.name: Los compadres
restaurants.description: Los compadres is a mexican restaurant located in Saltillo.
restaurants.address: Centro (General cepeda), Saltillo, Coahuila de Zaragoza
